pr_title: Do not copy mapping from dependent variable to prediction field in regression analysis

timeline.message: Do not copy mapping from dependent variable to prediction field in regression analysis

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return {@link List} containing fields for which the mappings should be handled explicitly
          
          
            
                 * @return {@link Map} containing fields for which the mappings should be handled explicitly
timeline.author: benwtrent
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -42,15 +42,12 @@
     Map<String, Long> getFieldCardinalityLimits();
 
     /**
-     * Returns fields for which the mappings should be copied from source index to destination index.
-     * Each entry of the returned {@link Map} is of the form:
-     *   key   - field path in the destination index
-     *   value - field path in the source index from which the mapping should be taken
+     * Returns fields for which the mappings should be either predefined or copied from source index to destination index.
      *
      * @param resultsFieldName name of the results field under which all the results are stored
-     * @return {@link Map} containing fields for which the mappings should be copied from source index to destination index
+     * @return {@link List} containing fields for which the mappings should be handled explicitly

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/x-pack/plugin/core/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/core/ml/dataframe/analyses/DataFrameAnalysis.java b/x-pack/plugin/core/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/core/ml/dataframe/analyses/DataFrameAnalysis.java
index 2bbb065bab5..e79458abe38 100644
--- a/x-pack/plugin/core/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/core/ml/dataframe/analyses/DataFrameAnalysis.java
+++ b/x-pack/plugin/core/src/main/java/org/elasticsearch/xpack/core/ml/dataframe/analyses/DataFrameAnalysis.java

@@ -44,8 +44,9 @@ public interface DataFrameAnalysis extends ToXContentObject, NamedWriteable {
     /**
      * Returns fields for which the mappings should be either predefined or copied from source index to destination index.
      *
+     * @param mappingsProperties mappings.properties portion of the index mappings
      * @param resultsFieldName name of the results field under which all the results are stored
-     * @return {@link List} containing fields for which the mappings should be handled explicitly
+     * @return {@link Map} containing fields for which the mappings should be handled explicitly
      */
     Map<String, Object> getExplicitlyMappedFields(Map<String, Object> mappingsProperties, String resultsFieldName);

timeline.message: Do not copy mapping from dependent variable to prediction field in regression analysis
Relax the assertion so that it expects at least one "feature_importance.field" field in the results
Restore Regression's explicitly mapped field in tests
